id-18882.title: Deeplight Restaurant
id-18882.post-content:
The Deeplight Restaurant template is a cool, contemporary design with a full screen image, central navigation and a subtle arrow directing you down. Further down the homepage, things lighten up with a white background and lots of image options.

The design includes lots of options for content, a menu section, testimonials, booking option and contact details. Everything a food business would want from a page. There are also relevant extra pages suitable for the niche.

Key features of the Deeplight Restaurant template

  • Contemporary design with modern touches throughout
  • Sections for menus, images and testimonials
  • Subtle graphic encourages you to scroll down
  • Extra pages relevant to food businesses
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
id-18882.post-excerpt: Contemporary website template ideal for cafes, restaurants and food businesses

id-51452.title: Theatre Artist
id-51452.post-content:
The Theater Artist template is a dark design with an elegant feel thanks to gold contrast color. The design has a full screen image and simple navigation that gives an upscale look while the rest of the homepage includes everything you might need to promote yourself or your business.

While configured for an actor, you can see how it could work for musicians, bands or other businesses. It’s easy to customize and allows you to change everything you see on the page using a drag and drop page builder.

Key features of the Theater Artist template

  • Elegant design ideal as a business website or portfolio
  • Attractive dark theme with gold contrast color
  • Lots of product and service areas
  • Useful timeline element on the homepage
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
id-51452.post-excerpt: Upscale web template with dark design and gold elements that stand out

id-88000.title: Financial Advisor
id-88000.post-content:
The Financial Advisor template helps create trust immediately with sensible colors, calm typography and a layout that encourages engagement. There’s also a form in the hero section to immediately accept signups.

The readymade pages are designed for the financial industry but could be tweaked to suit any type of business. The template is fully compatible with popular page builders, allowing you to customize every aspect of the design, from the header to the footer. It’s also fully responsive and SEO friendly for the widest reach.

Key features of the Financial Advisors template

  • Well-designed web template for consultants and advisors
  • Smart layout with contact forms throughout
  • Builds authority and trust ideal for the niche
  • SEO friendly and fully responsive
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
id-88000.post-excerpt: Financial Advisor template designed to create trust and interest

id-47138.title: Event Management Agency
id-47138.post-content:
The Event Management Agency template is a business website with a professional feel. It’s engaging and includes options for a video header as well as images to show off the events you manage. It’s a very modern design with instant appeal.

The homepage includes lots of content areas to share products and services, a portfolio area to show off previous events, a testimonial area and optional blog and event sections. Everything can be fully customized so you can build your pages however you like.

Key features of the Event Management Agency template

  • Professional business template ideal for event management companies
  • Lots of content areas for products and services
  • Supports video and audio headers
  • Attractive portfolio section to showcase previous events
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
id-47138.post-excerpt: Professional web template ideal for businesses that like to show as well as tell

id-47815.title: Online Courses
id-47815.post-content:
The Online Courses template uses reassuring colors and plenty of whitespace to build authority immediately. It’s ideal for schools, colleges, universities and online learning. Built to convert and provide everything you need to deliver eLearning courses.

The template has a relaxed feel, with light colors, attractive course boxes and course pages, lots of banners and graphics to communicate and convert, as well as build confidence in students. It’s an excellent option for eLearning and is fully compatible with popular learning management systems.

Key features of the Online Courses template

  • Reassuring website template ideal for building trust
  • Attractive course elements and course pages
  • Built to convert and sell as well as build authority
  • Supports popular learning management systems
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
id-47815.post-excerpt: Reassuring web template ideal for schools, colleges, universities and online learning

id-51405.title: Child Care Blog
id-51405.post-content:
The Child Care Blog template is a great option for sharing your expertise, using as a childcare business website or for becoming the next Mumsnet. It’s a light, engaging design with fullscreen header and a genuine, welcoming feel.

The template includes flexible content areas with areas for images, a biography, your latest posts, products and services, testimonials and a signup form. Extra pages reflect the niche and can be easily customized to suit your particular needs.

Key features of the Child Care Blog template

  • Professional blog template ideal for childcare or similar niches
  • Light and engaging design with a genuine feel
  • Flexible content areas you can customize to suit
  • Supplementary pages ideal for the industry
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
id-51405.post-excerpt: Light and engaging web template for childminders and the childcare niche

id-47745.title: Online Programming Course
id-47745.post-content:
The Online Programming Course template is ideal for schools, colleges, universities or online learning. It’s a light design with bold colors that reassure visitors as soon as they arrive, ready for them to explore the rest of your website.

The template includes a very attractive homepage with course outline areas and a selection of course pages to add more detail. The template is fully compatible with most learning management systems and WooCommerce, so you’re all set to offer courses for free or for money.

Key features of the Online Programming Course template

  • Light website template with strong colors for learning
  • Compatible with learning management systems
  • Compatible with WooCommerce for paid courses
  • Ideal for schools, colleges, universities or online learning
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
id-47745.post-excerpt: Light online course website that welcomes you in and converts you easily

id-55936.title: Media Agency
id-55936.post-content:
The Media Agency template is a stylish dark design with bold colors and exactly the kind of impact a media agency would want to make. It’s a well-designed web template with strong imagery, bold content boxes and a well-chosen font.

The template includes typical content areas and supplementary pages you would need along with the flexibility to change anything you see on the page using a page builder. It’s an excellent option for any agency!

Key features of the Media Agency template

  • Stylish dark design that makes an impact
  • Well-chosen colors and fonts
  • Prominent product and service sections
  • Cutting edge design ideal for the niche
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
id-55936.post-excerpt: Stylish dark website template ideal for freelancers, media or digital agencies

id-21574.title: Life Coach
id-21574.post-content:
The Life Coach template is a simple, effective design that enables your content to take center stage. It’s a welcoming template with a static image header with headline and clear content and service areas down the page to help tell your story.

The template offers a range of flexible elements and pages you can customize to your particular needs without losing the overall appeal. The theme works seamlessly with WooCommerce and includes a product page so you can sell merch as soon as you launch.

Key features of the Life Coach template

  • Effective design ideal for life coaches and the wellness niche
  • Flexible pages and content areas can be easily personalized
  • Integrates with WooCommerce for selling online
  • Great use of images, content areas and layout
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
id-21574.post-excerpt: Effective web design that can be fully customized for life coaches or wellness

id-47529.title: Roofing Services
id-47529.post-content:
The Roofing Services web template is a bright and breezy business design that welcomes you with open arms. It opens with a fullscreen image with bright colors and white headline that sets the scene perfectly. It could be used for literally any type of business.

The design is light and easy to use, with modern fonts, lots of whitespace, a contact form front and center, creative product and service section and supplementary pages. It’s a very composed design that inspires confidence, ideal for business use.

Key features of the Roofing Services template

  • Bright and breezy design suitable for many types of business
  • Excellent layout with customizable content areas
  • Contact form front and center
  • Supplementary pages ideal for business
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
id-47529.post-excerpt: Bright and breezy web template suitable for almost any business you can think of

id-57190.title: Luxury Hotel
id-57190.post-content:
The Luxury Hotel template uses a dark design and gold color to create a feeling of elegance and luxury. It includes an attractive slider to paint the picture of a lifestyle and a parallax effect with hotel images as the background. All designed to help sell rooms.

The template includes typical content areas for a hotel including for rooms, amenities, dining and more. Each can be fully customized to suit your particular hotel, as can the portfolio, blog area and individual room and amenity pages. It’s the only hotel template you need!

Key features of the Luxury Hotel template

  • Elegant website template ideal for luxury hotels
  • Dark and gold colors create an exclusive feel
  • Lots of opportunities for images to help sell
  • Relevant content areas and pages for hotels
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
id-57190.post-excerpt: Elegant web template ideal for luxury hotels, travel and big ticket items
